UM

Interest computation

This page explains how to compute, validate and credit interest to individual members or to all members in Unit Master.

Interest computation

This section allows the user to compute or calculate interest, validate the interest, and credit the validated interest either to an individual member or to all members.

From this page, the user can compute interest for an individual client or for all clients using the following parameters:

  • Member number
  • All funds or single fund
  • Single date or period

After selecting the desired parameters, click on the Compute button to run the interest calculation.
